mapper.sql: id, project_id, identifier, specification, owner, manufactor, max_range, max_weight, standard_height, fix_moment, wind_speed, tilt_angle, is_online, status, place_point, comments, org_id, device_no, crane_no, gprs, is_del, create_time, create_user, modify_time, modify_user,

${alias}.id AS ${alias}_id, ${alias}.project_id AS ${alias}_project_id, ${alias}.identifier AS ${alias}_identifier, ${alias}.specification AS ${alias}_specification, ${alias}.owner AS ${alias}_owner, ${alias}.manufactor AS ${alias}_manufactor, ${alias}.max_range AS ${alias}_max_range, ${alias}.max_weight AS ${alias}_max_weight, ${alias}.standard_height AS ${alias}_standard_height, ${alias}.fix_moment AS ${alias}_fix_moment, ${alias}.wind_speed AS ${alias}_wind_speed, ${alias}.tilt_angle AS ${alias}_tile_angle, ${alias}.is_online AS ${alias}_is_online, ${alias}.status AS ${alias}_status, ${alias}.place_point AS ${alias}_place_point, ${alias}.comments AS ${alias}_comments, ${alias}.org_id AS ${alias}_org_id, ${alias}.device_no AS ${alias}_device_no, ${alias}.crane_no AS ${alias}_crane_no, ${alias}.gprs AS ${alias}_gprs, ${alias}.is_del AS ${alias}_is_del, ${alias}.create_time AS ${alias}_create_time, ${alias}.create_user AS ${alias}_create_user, ${alias}.modify_time AS ${alias}_modify_time, ${alias}.modify_user AS ${alias}_modify_user,
mapper.select:
SELECT
if(a.is_online=1,'在线',"离线") as statusName, b.name as projectName, o.name AS builderName, u.name as createUserName from t_project_crane a left join t_project_info b on a.project_id =b.id LEFT JOIN t_sys_organization o ON o.id = b.builder left join t_sys_user u on u.id=a.create_user
${ew.sqlSegment}
order by a.id desc

SELECT a.device_no, a.crane_no, a.project_id, a.identifier, a.specification, a.owner, a.manufactor, a.max_range, a.max_weight, a.standard_height, a.fix_moment, a.wind_speed, a.tilt_angle, a.gprs,
a.is_online as status, b.name as projectName, u.name as createUserName from t_project_crane a left join t_project_info b on a.project_id =b.id left join t_sys_user u on u.id=a.create_user where a.is_del = 0 and a.status = 1
and a.org_id in #{listItem}
order by a.id desc

select t_project_info.name as projectName,identifier,crane_no as craneNo,(select create_time from t_project_crane_heartbeat where end_time is null and t_project_crane_heartbeat.crane_id=t_project_crane.id and status=0 limit 1) as assembleDate,crane_no as craneNo, gprs,time_sum as timeSum, is_online as isOnline, device_no as deviceNo from t_project_info,t_project_crane where t_project_info.id=t_project_crane.project_id and t_project_crane.is_del=0
and (t_project_info.name like '%${keyword}%' or t_project_crane.identifier like '%${keyword}%' or t_project_crane.gprs like '%${keyword}%')

SELECT
if(a.is_online=1,"在线","离线") as statusName, b.name as projectName, c.name as createUserName, o.name AS builderName from t_project_crane a left join t_project_info b on b.id = a.project_id and b.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN t_sys_organization o ON o.id = b.builder left join t_project_user c on c.id = a.create_user
${ew.sqlSegment}
order by a.create_time desc

select b.device_no, a.`range`, a.weight, a.height, a.moment, a.rotary_angle , a.tilt_angle, a.wind_speed, c.name , c.certificate_no , c.phone, a.driver, a.create_time from t_project_crane_detail as a left join t_project_crane b on a.crane_id = b.id and b.is_del = 0 left join t_project_user c on c.id = a.driver and c.is_del =0 where a.is_del =0
and b.device_no = '${deviceNo}'
and b.org_id = ${orgId}
ORDER BY a.create_time desc LIMIT 1
select id, device_no from t_project_crane where device_no=#{deviceNo} and id!=#{id} and status=1 and is_del=0

SELECT crane.id, crane.project_id AS projectId, ( SELECT NAME FROM t_project_info WHERE t_project_info.id = crane.project_id ) AS projectName, DATE_FORMAT(work_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')as workDate, o.name AS builderName FROM t_project_crane crane LEFT JOIN t_project_crane_statistics_daily daily on crane.device_no = daily.device_no LEFT JOIN t_sys_organization o ON o.id = daily.builder
${ew.sqlSegment}

SELECT crane.id, crane.crane_no AS craneNO, crane.device_no AS deviceNo, ifnull(sum(lift_frequency),0) AS liftFrequency, DATE_FORMAT(work_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as workDate FROM t_project_crane crane LEFT JOIN t_project_crane_statistics_daily daily on crane.device_no = daily.device_no
${ew.sqlSegment}

SELECT crane.id, crane.crane_no AS craneNO, crane.device_no AS deviceNo, ifnull(sum(lift_frequency),0) AS liftFrequency, DATE_FORMAT(work_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as workDate FROM t_project_crane crane LEFT JOIN t_project_crane_statistics_daily daily on crane.device_no = daily.device_no
${ew.sqlSegment}

SELECT d.crane_id as craneId, d.device_no AS deviceNo, count(d.id) AS liftFrequency, DATE_FORMAT(d.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as workDate FROM t_project_crane_cyclic_work_duration d
${ew.sqlSegment}
